title: E-Commerce Companies Emerging as the Quick Adopters of Password Management Solutions
text:
The report titled Password Management Market – E-Commerce Outlook (2015-19) showcases an in-depth analysis of the market in terms of market size, segmentation by region, deployment model and end-user. This report also forecasts the growth numbers till 2019 (on a YoY basis) and hence suggests the Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) for the estimated period.
Increasing Online Shopping and Improved network infrastructure facilitating adoption
Due to increased online shopping and growing financial capabilities, E-commerce companies across the globe are experiencing strategic shift. Almost all leading E-commerce and web based companies are giving due importance for protection of customer data and in the process are spending heavily on upgrading their existing IT security infrastructure. This is being seen as a driving force behind the growth of password management solutions.
Although, the revenue realized from E-commerce companies towards password management market in 2014 was very less compared to that from financial institutions, the compound annual growth rate of has been very close to that of financial institutions. If the rate of adoption remains the same in the coming years, there would be no surprises if E-commerce companies surpass financial institutions as the major consumers of password management solutions.
Introduction of cloud based password management solutions is being seen as a boon for small and medium level e-commerce and web based companies as they are offered on a pay-as-you go model and the user company does not have to worry about the management of their employee passwords. Introduction of more effective and innovative products which would cater to the exclusive needs of the e-commerce companies will result in further increase of demand among them.
Market Segments and Forecasts Covered in the Report
The Global Password Management market is segmented by:
- Regions (North America, Europe, APAC, South America, RoW)
- Deployment (On-Premise, Hosted)
- End users (Enterprise, Mid-size, Small Business)
- Vertical (Financial Services, E-commerce, IT and Telecommunication, Manufacturing, Others)
Companies discussed in the Global Password Management research report are NetIQ, Sailpoint Technologies, Imprivata, Microsoft, IBM, CA Technologies, Hitachi ID Systems, Dell, Courion Corporation, BeyondTrust, Avatier, Specops Software, Tools4ever, Passportal, Thycotic, AgileBits, ManageEngine, Meldium, Siber Enterprise Group, my1login
